headline: Sanders Wins Endorsement From N.H. Union Local
abstract: The move by SEA/SEIU Local 1984 stood in contrast to its national affiliateâ€™s decision so far to stay neutral in the presidential race.
lead_paragraph: A local union branch of New Hampshire state and local employees said Sunday that it had voted to endorse Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont for the Democratic presidential nomination, another labor endorsement for a candidate whose political stock continues to rise less than a month before the Iowa caucuses.
